verses.verse: Now when <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> of Judea <S%G2449><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of King <S%G935><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> wise men <S%G3097><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east <S%G395><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> saying,

"Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who is <S%G2076><s%> born <S%G5088><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> we saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> star <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the east, <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have come <S%G2064><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

When <S%G1161><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G5015><s%> he was troubled, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Gathering <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> of the people, <S%G2992><s%> he asked <S%G4441><s%> them <S%G846><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> would be born. <S%G1080><s%>

They <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "In <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> is written <S%G1125><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> 'You Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> of Judah, <S%G2448><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> in no <S%G3760><s%> way least <S%G1646><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the princes <S%G2232><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Judah: <S%G2448><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> shall come <S%G1831><s%> forth a governor, <S%G2233><s%> who shall shepherd my <S%G3450><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>'"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> secretly <S%G2977><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> the wise men, <S%G3097><s%> and learned <S%G198><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> them <S%G846><s%> exactly <S%G198><s%> what time <S%G5550><s%> the star <S%G792><s%> appeared. <S%G5316><s%>

He sent <S%G3992><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> and search <S%G1833><s%> diligently <S%G199><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> the young child. <S%G3813><s%> When <S%G1875><s%> you have found <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G518><s%> bring me <S%G3427><s%> word, <S%G3704><s%> so that I <S%G2504><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> may come <S%G2064><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

They, <S%G1161><s%> having heard <S%G191><s%> the king, <S%G935><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> their way; <S%G2532><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> the star, <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the east, <S%G395><s%> went before <S%G4254><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> it came <S%G2064><s%> and stood <S%G2476><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> was. <S%G2258><s%>
When <S%G1161><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> the star, <S%G792><s%> they rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> with exceedingly <S%G4970><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy. <S%G5479><s%>

They came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G2147><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they fell down <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> Opening <S%G455><s%> their <S%G846><s%> treasures, <S%G2344><s%> they offered <S%G4374><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> gifts: <S%G1435><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> frankincense, <S%G3030><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> myrrh. <S%G4666><s%>

Being <S%G2532><s%> warned in <S%G2596><s%> a dream <S%G3677><s%> that they <S%G344><s%> shouldn't <S%G3361><s%> return <S%G344><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> they went <S%G402><s%> back to <S%G4314><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> another <S%G243><s%> way. <S%G3598><s%>

Now when <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> had departed, <S%G402><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to Joseph <S%G2501><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a dream, <S%G3677><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Arise <S%G1453><s%> and take <S%G3880><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stay <S%G2468><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I <S%G302><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> will <S%G3195><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

He arose <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the death <S%G5054><s%> of Herod; <S%G2264><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Out of <S%G1537><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> I called <S%G2564><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was mocked <S%G1702><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the wise men, <S%G3097><s%> was <S%G2373><s%> exceedingly <S%G3029><s%> angry, <S%G2373><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sent out, <S%G649><s%> and killed <S%G337><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the male children <S%G3816><s%> who were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the surrounding <S%G3725><s%> countryside, <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> two years old <S%G1332><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> under, <S%G2736><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the exact time <S%G5550><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had learned <S%G198><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the wise men. <S%G3097><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> that which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> Jeremiah <S%G2408><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> was fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"A voice <S%G5456><s%> was <S%G191><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Ramah, <S%G4471><s%> lamentation, <S%G2355><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> mourning, <S%G3602><s%> Rachel <S%G4478><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> for her <S%G846><s%> children; <S%G5043><s%> she <S%G2309><s%> wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> be comforted, <S%G3870><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> no more. <S%G3756><s%>"

But when <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> was dead, <S%G5053><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a dream <S%G3677><s%> to Joseph <S%G2501><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> saying,

"Arise <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G3880><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> those who sought <S%G2212><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%>'s life <S%G5590><s%> are dead. <S%G2348><s%>"

He arose <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> the young child <S%G3813><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Archelaus <S%G745><s%> was reigning <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the place of <S%G473><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> he was afraid <S%G5399><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%> Being <S%G1161><s%> warned in <S%G2596><s%> a dream, <S%G3677><s%> he withdrew <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the region <S%G3313><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and lived <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Nazareth; <S%G3478><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophets: <S%G3754><s%> "He will be called <S%G2564><s%> a Nazarene. <S%G3480><s%>"
